title: Fnatic, TPA, and SKT T1 skins return

replies.body: {{champion:154}} needs a new skin. Rito Pls
riot said making zac skins is a nightmare because of the way he is the fact that he melts and changes his model so much
you do know pool party {{champion:154}}  would just be blue right =3
and you know they said they won't make a recolor as their next Zac skin right? They want to make a REAL skin first.

Although this makes complete sense, having read said articles where they said they didn't want to just come out with new colors, the timing is hilarious considering they just came out with chroma skins. XD
I still want to see Nanobot Zac, where instead of goo hes made of a bunch of little nanobots.
Now that could be pretty cool. I could see them doing a lot with that.
Well, maybe like a molten rock {{champion:154}} would work. HIs chunks would be lava and they could slowly turn into rock. Maybe something like that?

Real skins: 
-Blood born Zac -made out of blood(duh) and it can congeal
-Ectoplasm Zac -halloween skin
-I agree with pool party Zac except add a pool noodle or have swim trunks lie around during his passive
-Insert other great ideas here-

PP Zac isn't much of a skin though.

http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2014/289/1/a/league_of_legends__pool_party_zac_by_gisalmeida-d8313mr.jpg

Like this, you'd just change the skin to blue, maybe add a few floaties, goggles and shorts to him... but that'd still be in the line of 750s which is a basic recolor/reskin tier. They wouldn't really have any new effects or anything, and that's what they are saying they really want for him.

They need a Dubstep Zac, where it just goes like
'wub, wub, wub, dub, wub, wub'
As someone who is colorblind, skins such as rocket girl tristana and other skins that are simply a recolor (especially chroma packs) are extremely pointless.

Do you mean the old Riot Girl skin? Because Rocket Girl is very much a different skin, it has a lot of detail to it. The old Riot Girl though, now that was a recolor as it was just changing her to pink for the most part. The new one though for the rework has a lot more detail making it a different skin as well.
Guardian of the sands Zac (aka. the sandman)
Which champion did you THINK they came out with chroma packs for?

A great skin for {{champion:154}}  could be mecha zac, or robot zac. For his passive, small bolts and screws would fly out of his body. For his q his arms would extend but like a robot. W would be hard, maybe an explosion? For his e, he would have a jet pack that pops out, and starts to charge up. And for his Ult, Rito will need to think of that one. {{champion:154}} out
my thoughts exactly^^^{{champion:154}} {{item:3725}} always
My thoughts egg{{champion:154}} {{champion:64}}
Pixelated? So he explodes into several boxes of pixels? (and watch peoples framerates drop too)
16-bit Zac/Arcade Zac.

Dear Summoner,
We will soon release Rainbow Chroma Zac bundle.
You are welcome.
-Rito

But summoners no longer exist...
RIP in pepperoni{{item:3070}}
If they are going to make a Zac skin I say that it absolutely has to be Debonair Zac. Then he can finally get his suit. {{champion:154}}
what about oogie boogie zac?  burlap sac explodes into bugs.
I think It'd be sweet to have a Black Zac skin, like Venom from Spiderman, obviously that fits 0 storyline
debonair {{champion:154}} would be the coolest zac skin his passive would be he drops money. Rito plz
and his unstable matter would be he throws money in the air.
{{champion:154}} has a hard model to recreate but with the chroma packs its a little bit of shading and paint bucket and bam totally new {{champion:154}}
I got fnatic jarven for my good behavior mystery skin, i guess it's not as special anymore {{item:3070}}
i got  toxic dr.mundo :(

Good behavior gets a toxic skin.
Rito plz.
I got fuckin' Cottontail Teemo, how do you think i feel
U think Cottontail Teemo is bad? I got badger teemo :/
Aww , your lucky i got a spellthieft lux from that free mystery skin... im not even play lux that much
I got DragonBlade Riven XD

All of you are lucky, I got pumpkinhead fiddle for my good behavior skin.  And then shortly after, my friend gifted me spectral fiddle. AND THEN ANOTHER MYSTERY GIFT, WAS FUCKIN' BANDITO FIDDLESTICKS.I don't even play fiddle...It makes me feel even worse now that Risen fiddlesticks is here.{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
EMERALD TARIC, you think fiddle is bad?!?!
I got Aetherwing Kayle...

Unchained {{champion:12}}.

I think I win.
good behavior mystery skin?
during christmas
ITS NOT LEGACY IF U KEEP BRINGING THEM BACK EVERY YEAR
Legacy ALWAYS come back, LIMITED edition skins don't. There is a clear difference.
they brought back championship thresh didnt they

That's because that was Legacy.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins
Just want to point out that they plan on bringing Riven back too (in a bundle) once 5 championship skins are out.
No, that's just a rumor someone started, and if you read some of my other comments (like the one below) you'll see that I've already said she might come back by 2016.

yo im waiting for b baller {{champion:26}}. he could throw basket balls for his bombs and he can sit on a chair with a score board of his head that shows the enemies and teams kills.that would be so sick.
We need Samsung IMP!{{champion:29}}
It's coming.
